newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Highlights of Monday's Commission briefing.
newsitem.headline: Highlights of Monday's Commission briefing.

text.p: There were no announcements or questions during Monday's European Commission midday briefing.
The Commission released the following documents:
- IP/97/520: Commission reviews the regulation governing the European Environment Agency (EEA).
- IP/97/521: Algeria: the Commission grants 7 million ecus humanitarian aid for Western Saharan refugees.
- IP/97/522: Workshop on options to facilitate investments in the energy sector of the EU's Mediterranean Partner Countries.
- IP/97/523: Joint press release on the European Union/Russia Space Dialogue: Cooperation and coordination in space related activities.
